thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 8 of 62
thread.title: Katie

author: Katie
title: Katie
text: I was a little uneasy using the site and setting up my own trip. I did not receive my confirmation email and thought it was all a scam at first. The very next morning I received a call from Mary explaining something wasn't quite right and we had to correct some things. She was very helpful and was able to answer all my other questions and put my mind at ease. Can't wait for Punta Cana in the fall!!
